articles.title: Blue Jays fire manager Charlie Montoyo after team plummets to fourth in AL East - The Athletic
articles.description: At 46-42, Toronto had fallen to fourth place in the American League East, 15 1/2 games behind the Yankees and just four games ahead of the Orioles.
articles.content:
Charlie Montoyo has been fired as manager of the Blue Jays, the club said Wednesday. Bench coach John Schneider was named interim manager through this season.
